item.title: Skip Bo Mobile Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Skip Bo Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Skip Bo Mobile

Skip Bo Mobile is an exciting card game with both campaign and multiplayer modes. Although the cards resemble UNO cards, the rules of the game are different, so the game is quite interesting and unique. As in almost any mobile game, Skip Bo has a currency for which you can buy a variety of items. Fortunately, there are many codes in the game that will give you a bunch of Coins.

Updated July 22, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new wave of rewards has just arrived for Skip Bo , with the latest codes offering a solid batch of Coins to claim. These bonuses can help you restock your supplies, upgrade your setup, or just keep things running smoothly. If you’ve used up the previous codes, now’s your chance to collect something new. More codes may be added in future updates, so be sure to check back often.

All Skip Bo Codes

Working Skip Bo Codes

  • PERFECTSTAY – Enter this code to get 200 Coins. (NEW)

How to Redeem Codes in Skip Bo Mobile

In mobile games, it is very important for players to be able to find where to redeem codes. Fortunately, in Skip Bo, redeeming codes is very simple, as you can see from these instructions:

  • Go to the Shop tab. This is the button in the lower right corner of the screen.
  • In the Shop, you will see offers to buy Coins and below them the Gift Code field. Click on it.
  • Enter or paste a code from our list of current codes.
  • Click Redeem to get your rewards.

Try to redeem all current codes as soon as possible because they expire very quickly, and you will not be able to receive rewards for them.

Skip Bo Mobile is available on iOS and Android.

item.title: Stop Killing Games Initiative Accused of Violating EU Rules
item.description:
Stop Killing Games founder Ross Scott has released a video detailing an anonymous accusation levied against him and the movement of deliberately obfuscating facts and misleading the EU Parliament. Started as a response to the delisting of Ubisoft’s The Crew in 2024, the Stop Killing Games movement aims to pressure publishers into creating an “end-of-life” plan for all games, ensuring that once online services wind down, paying users retain ownership in a meaningful capacity.

After a video from Ross Scott went viral in June, receiving coverage from both media outlets and content creators, the movement quickly gained traction among the community. As a result, it only took a month for the Stop Killing Games’ EU petition to reach 1.4 million signatures. Barring any unforeseen obstacles, this number should all but guarantee that the petition reaches the EU Parliament, allowing lawmakers to assess its proposal.

In a recent YouTube video, Ross Scott revealed that an anonymous source had accused “Stop Destroying Videogames,” the legal entity behind the European Citizens Initiative, of violating EU rules. The two alleged violations were “False No Funding Declaration” and “Systemic Concealment of Major Contribution,” claiming that Scott’s “professional contributions to the campaign” amount to at least €63,000-147,000 and “constitutes quantifiable in-kind contributions under transparency regulations.” The complaint argued that contributions of this nature need to be declared in accordance with EU laws, and by not doing so, the petition is in violation of those laws.

Anonymous Complaint Alleges Stop Killing Games Violated EU Transparency Regulations

Scott maintained that all claims levied against him were false, using information on the public EU Parliament website to prove his point. He also clarified that his role as a voluntary promoter doesn’t qualify him as a sponsor under ECI regulation, as alleged in the complaint. Scott also argued that while he sometimes worked long hours to ensure the success of the EU petition for Stop Destroying Videogames, it does not constitute “professional contributions,” as he is not a professional in a legal sense.

Additionally, given the nature of the recent pushback against Stop Killing Games, Scott did not think that this complaint was from a “concerned citizen.” Instead, he feels that it is the industry’s latest attempt to cripple the initiative in its infancy.

In the video, Scott assured viewers that the EU petition is unlikely to be negatively impacted by the complaint, as the claims have little to no legal basis. He warned, however, that future attempts to undermine the initiative may not be as far off the mark. Ultimately, Scott acknowledged that while there is a lot of opposition, the movement is not without its allies, citing the Vice President of the EU Parliament’s support for Stop Killing Games as proof.

Your comment has not been saved

item.title: Fortnite Players Want a New Type of Glider
item.description:
Summary

  • Some players want a universal flying glider that isn't tied to a specific skin in Fortnite.
  • During Fortnite's Summer Road Trip, players can earn the Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 bundle for free.
  • A leak suggested that mud could return during Chapter 6 Season 4, possibly allowing concealment from thermal weapons.

Some Fortnite players are asking Epic Games to add a glider with a flying animation that can be used universally, as all current flying gliders are tied to specific skins like Superman and Captain Marvel. Fortnite is currently nearing the end of Chapter 6 Season 3, which introduced iconic DC heroes like Superman and Robin to the popular battle royale.

Epic Games recently revealed that players will be able to claim a wide variety of free rewards during Fortnite 's Summer Road Trip, which begins on July 22 at 9 AM ET. While players will be able to earn a pickaxe, wrap, and more, the star of the show appears to be the Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 bundle, which gives players a free skin to use with sports cars. Vehicles have become a large part of Fortnite , as they give players a lot of mobility and allow them to show off a bit of flair with fresh cosmetics. Players looking to claim all the Summer Road Trip rewards will need to act fast, as the quests will only be available through August 7.

In a recent post on Reddit, PresYapper4294 questioned why Epic Games hasn't released a universal glider that makes it look like a character is flying. Currently, only specific skins have access to gliders that make them appear as if they're flying through the air while gliding. While the original Superman skin released as part of the battle pass for Chapter 2 Season 7 has access to one of these gliders, the Chapter 6 Season 3 version of Superman in Fortnite does not. Instead, his current glider makes it appear as if he's holding up the globe from the Daily Planet as he slowly descends toward the island. Many fans were hoping that the current version of Superman would be compatible with the original's glider, but that doesn't appear to be happening.

Fortnite Players Want a Universal Flying Glider

Players responded to the post with enthusiasm, asking Epic Games to add a universal flying glider to the title at some point in the future. They also suggested that the game would benefit from a universal pickaxe that allows skins to use their fists while harvesting. Fortnite is always adding new cosmetics, which means that Epic Games could introduce something like this in the future.

A recent leak suggested that a popular gameplay mechanic could be returning to Fortnite during Chapter 6 Season 4. According to leakers, mud could be making a return, which previously allowed gamers to slide faster and conceal themselves from thermal weapons. If true, this could mean that thermal weapons will be making a serious comeback in the upcoming season, which will launch in August. With so much content to enjoy and even more just around the corner, many fans are feeling optimistic about the future of Fortnite .

item.title: Roblox: Undertale Adventures TD Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Undertale Adventures TD Codes
  • How to Redeem Undertale Adventures TD Codes
  • How to Get More Undertale Adventures TD Codes

Undertale Adventures TD offers players a rather unusual tower defense experience. You will have to fight off waves of enemies in a dungeon inspired by Undertale , so you will find many familiar characters. But to summon them, you will need to earn a lot of souls. For this, we recommend you use Undertale Adventures TD codes.

These Roblox codes will reward you with valuable rewards, including trait rerolls and other useful consumables. With their help, you will be able to upgrade your units and progress faster. But hurry, as their validity period is limited.

Updated July 22, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, there's only one new code to claim, but it still gives out some helpful rewards. It’s a good chance to grab a little something extra while you wait for more. Since codes can show up at any time, checking back later could bring more freebies your way. We’ll keep this guide updated with any new additions.

All Undertale Adventures TD Codes

Working Undertale Adventures TD Codes

  • THANKYOU10kMEMBERS - Redeem this code to claim free rewards (NEW)
  • THANKYOU12MILLIONVISITS - Redeem this code to claim free rewards

Expired Undertale Adventures TD Codes

  • JUNE10UPDATE
  • WINTER2025
  • HOTLANDS2025
  • WELOVEUAPLAYERS

Initially, players in Undertale Adventures TD have only two units. With their help, you will be able to clear the first stages without any problems. However, on the genocide difficulty, as well as later levels, you will need many more towers. In addition, you will want them to be stronger than the starting ones. Therefore, the main goal of players is to earn Souls needed to summon units, as well as items required to upgrade them. Fortunately, the developers often release Undertale Adventures TD codes that will help you with this.

Even a few Roblox codes will be enough to get many valuable items. However, it is worth noting that after some time after the release, each code expires. So we strongly recommend that you use them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Undertale Adventures TD Codes

Using codes in Undertale Adventures TD is no different from most other Roblox experiences. This feature is available from the first minutes of the game, so even beginners will be able to get free goodies from the developers. To do this, you just need to follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Undertale Adventures TD .
  • Then, click on the Codes button on the right side of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the new window and press the Enter key to claim the reward.

How to Get More Undertale Adventures TD Codes

If you want to receive fresh Undertale Adventures TD codes as soon as they are released, you should start following the official social media pages of the developers. There you will find all the news about upcoming updates and giveaways of goodies:

  • Side Productions Roblox group
  • Side Productions Discord server
Roblox

item.title: Roblox: Dolly's Factory Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Dolly's Factory Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Dolly's Factory
  • How to Get More Dolly's Factory Codes

Dolly's Factory is a Roblox game where you play as cute animals and go through rooms with Dead by Daylight -style gameplay. Although the game is disguised as a children's game, it is constantly tense and highly demanding on the player's skills. You will need to activate generators with puzzle elements and constantly run away from evil animatronics using various items, abilities, and elements of the environment.

Any mistake can be fatal, so it is worth preparing well before each game. It is advisable to save up some money and buy a character with good abilities and stats that best suit your playing style. This will require a lot of in-game currency, so we recommend redeeming Dolly's Factory codes from our guide to get free rewards.

Updated July 22, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: New rewards have arrived in Dolly's Factory , with the latest codes offering more dollybucks to boost your progress. These bonuses can be helpful if you're looking to speed things up or unlock something new. Be sure to grab them while they’re still active, as there’s no telling how long they’ll stay available. More updates could add even more rewards soon, so it’s a good idea to check back often.

All Dolly's Factory Codes

Working Dolly's Factory Codes

  • 10klikes - Redeem this code to get dollybucks. (NEW)
  • 5klikes - Redeem this code to get dollybucks. (NEW)
  • thequeenishere - Redeem this code to get dollybucks. (NEW)

Expired Dolly's Factory Codes

  • alphatester - Redeem this code to get 1,000 dollybucks.
  • 1klikes - Redeem this code to get 250 dollybucks.

The main currency in Dolly's Factory is Dolly Bucks, and fortunately, you can get them for free by redeeming codes. This will be useful for both beginners and experienced players, as it will allow you to immediately buy a new powerful character, or at least get closer to doing so.

How to Redeem Codes in Dolly's Factory

As with many other Roblox games, Dolly's Factory codes are an important means of attracting and retaining players, so using them is fairly straightforward. However, despite this, new players may find it difficult to understand how to redeem codes and may need some help. To help you out, we've created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Dolly's Factory :

  • Launch Roblox and open Dolly's Factory .
  • Look at the top of the screen. Click on the Codes button with a bird and a letter.
  • A window for redeeming codes will open. Paste the code from our list of working codes into the text field and click on the pink Redeem button.

Remember that codes should always be redeemed as soon as possible. If they expire, you will not be able to receive rewards for them.

How to Get More Dolly's Factory Codes

You can get more Roblox codes by bookmarking this page in your browser. We update it regularly so you can get all the rewards. We also recommend checking out Dolly's Factory developers' social media accounts:

  • Dolly's Factory Roblox game page
  • Dolly's Factory Roblox group
  • Dolly's Factory Discord server
  • Dolly's Factory X page
